plot outline: Haani is a romantic saga spanning two different generations of a family. It tells the story of love, friendship and honor immortalized by commitment. The film simultaneously narrates 2 plots. Ranjit (Harbhajan) and Jagga (Sarabjit) are best friends in 1964 where Ranjit falls for Sukhaan (Mahreen) and loves her to death. Other plot involves Harman (Anuj) and Preet's (Sonia) love story in 2013 and Tony (Rupan Bal) who has similar role to Jagga in the movie. Somehow fate connects these love stories together.

synopsis: This is the story of these true men of the soil, the Jatts who are defined by their simplicity, honesty, courage, good looks & above all - for honoring their commitments lifelong, be it for love, friendship or even enmity. A romantic sage spanning two generations, this film tells the story of love, friendship & honor immortalized by commitment.
